result.title: Data Management Plan
result.description: A Data Management Plan will be submitted in the form of a Deliverable - due date: M6 - as required, since the STEM4youth is participating in the Open Research Data PILOT in Horizon 2020 (Article 29.3 of the Horizon 2020 Annotated Model Grant Agreement).

result.title: Revised Data Management Plan
result.description:
"An updated Data Management Plan will be submitted in M30 in the form of a Deliverable, taking into account the STEM4youth results and outcome.
The insertion of the ""Revised Data Management Plan"" is in line with the recommendation included in the EC document: ""Guidelines on Data Management in Horizon 2020 (Version 2.1, 15 February 2016) (see via: http://ec.europa.eu/research/participants/data/ref/h2020/grants_manual/hi/oa_pilot/h2020-hi-oa-data-mgt_en.pdf ) in which it is stated as follows: ""Updates: Data Management Plan should be updated - if appropriate - during the project lifetime (in the form of deliverables) (...) (page 4)"". STEM4youth is participating in the Open Research Data PILOT in Horizon 2020 (Article 29.3 of the Horizon 2020 Annotated Model Grant Agreement)."

result.title: Multidisciplinary course
result.description: The multidisciplinary course includes six science sub-courses developed by partners Mathematics: consist of videos and education games (Editor: VSB) Physics - 6 experiments for students accessible via Internet Laboratory, video recorded experiments, 4 ideas for hands-on activities (Editor: WUT) Chemistry – key applications of chemistry (Editor: JSI) Astronomy – up to 10 multimedia lessons (Editor: RP) Engineering - 7 engineering design challenges. Each challenge will be connected to a specific engineering field. (Editor: EF) Medicine - Key medical challenges (Editor: FUV

result.title: Project dissemination activities
result.description: Project videos (Editor: FUV, M5) Bi-Monthly Creative Content (A series of photography, video and animation items) updated on project website (Editor: UB, M5, M13, M25, M30) Press release circulated in all partner countries in the native language partner responsible: one per country (Editor: EF, M2, M13, M25, M36) 1 Open access Peer-reviewed publication per partner across the life-spam of the project (Editor: WUT, M15, M30., Output To: academic community but open access) interactive pop-ups on STEM-based disciplines at existing festivals or as one-off (Editor: FUV M13, M25, M30) 2 presentations/activity a year at external related events (Editor: FUV, M13, M25, M30, Output To: targeted audiences) An international public conference in each partner country (Editor: All, M25, Output To: targeted audiences) 3 sets of printed material for different audiences produced and circulated in each partner country (FUV, M18, Output To: targeted audiences) A final recommendations workshop (Editor: WUT, M30, Output To: targeted audiences)

result.title: Report on employment labour market trends in EU
result.description: The report will synthesize and present the results of T2.1. and T2.2. In general, all findings will be summarized on the EU level, but some data and conclusions will be also provided for specific countries in light of technology specializations. The scenarios developed under T2.2. will be presented in the report, together with the insights derived in the interactive workshop discussions.

result.title: First version of the training module
result.description: The first version of the training module is a deliverable describing the functionalities of the first iteration of training platform As for the differences between this first training module version and the first version of the NADINE platform it is that the training module is part of the overall NADINE platform A part of the overall system will be to adaptively train the user while other part also coexists such as the portfolio building D61 or the recommender Systems D53 All these systems along with others will be integrated under the NADINE platform D83 which serves as the overall system
